Featuring HERO 25K, our most advanced gaming sensor with precise 1:1 tracking and class-leading power efficiency. HERO 25K also achieves 25,600 max DPI, plus zero smoothing, filtering, or acceleration.

About Product

Your power, your control. Conquer MOBA, MMO, and Battle Royale gameplay with the strategically designed G604 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Mouse. 15 programmable controls join forces with ultra-fast LIGHTSPEED dual connectivity and the class-leading HERO 25K sensor. It’s a multifaceted battle weapon that lets you play longer, play better, and make your play.

Your power, your control. Conquer MOBA, MMO, and Battle Royale gameplay with the strategically designed G604 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Mouse.

Program, refine, and win. Master your arsenal in Battle Royale, MMO, and MOBA gameplay with tactically positioned controls in optimal quantity and configuration. Program, refine, and win. Master your arsenal in Battle Royale, MMO, and MOBA gameplay with tactically positioned controls in optimal quantity and configuration.

Will let you

  • Ability to move fully again
  • Fully enjoy your new life
  • Forget about motion problems
  • Ability to move fully again
  • Fully enjoy your new life
  • Forget about motion problems
Contents of delivery
  • G604 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Mouse
  • LIGHTSPEED Wireless Receiver
  • Extension cable for USB receiver
  • User Documentation
  • AA battery
Physical characteristics
  • Length: 130 mm
  • Width: 80 mm
  • Thickness: 45 mm
  • Weight: 135 g, with AA battery
Other features
  • Dual-mode scroll wheel with super-fast scrolling
  • Built-in memory
  • Mechanical buttons with spring mechanism
Requirements
  • LIGHTSPEED mode: USB port and Windows® 7 or later, macOS® 10.12 or later, Chrome OS™, or Android™ 3.2 or later
  • Bluetooth Mode: Bluetooth-enabled device running Windows 8 or later, macOS 10.12 or later, Chrome OS or Android 5.0 or later
  • Internet connection required to download Logitech G HUB software

  • Characteristics
